Package com.example.Bank.Controllers

Interface ChatGroupsController

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatGroupsControllerImp
@RequestMapping("api/v1/chatgroups") @RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:8081") public interface ChatGroupsController
Interface for handling chat group-related endpoints. This interface defines methods for handling endpoints related to chat groups in the application.
Author:
Pedro Pereira

  • Method Details

    • getChatGroup

      List<ChatGroupResponse> getChatGroup(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @RequestParam(name="page",defaultValue="0") Integer page, @RequestParam(name="size",defaultValue="10") Integer size)
      Get a list of chat groups. This method handles the endpoint to retrieve a list of chat groups. It takes authentication details, pagination parameters, and returns a list of ChatGroupResponse objects representing the chat groups.
      Parameters:
      jwt - The JWT token containing authentication information.
      page - The page number for pagination (default: 0).
      size - The page size for pagination (default: 10).
      Returns:
      A list of ChatGroupResponse objects representing the chat groups.

    • getChatGroup

      ChatGroupResponse getChatGroup(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID id)
      Get a chat group by ID. This method handles the endpoint to retrieve a chat group by its ID. It takes authentication details and the ID of the chat group to retrieve, and returns a ChatGroupResponse object representing the chat group.
      Parameters:
      jwt - The JWT token containing authentication information.
      id - The ID of the chat group to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ChatGroupResponse object representing the retrieved chat group.

    • createChatGroup

      ChatGroupResponse createChatGroup(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid CreateChatGroup createChatGroup)
      Create a new chat group. This method handles the endpoint to create a new chat group. It takes authentication details and a request object containing information about the new chat group to create, and returns a ChatGroupResponse object representing the created chat group.
      Parameters:
      jwt - The JWT token containing authentication information.
      createChatGroup - The request object containing information about the new chat group.
      Returns:
      A ChatGroupResponse object representing the created chat group.

    • AddMessageToChatGroup

      ChatGroupResponse AddMessageToChatGroup(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid MessageRequest messageRequest, @PathVariable UUID id)
      Add a message to a chat group. This method handles the endpoint to add a message to a chat group. It takes authentication details, a request object containing the message to add, and the ID of the chat group, and returns a ChatGroupResponse object representing the updated chat group.
      Parameters:
      jwt - The JWT token containing authentication information.
      messageRequest - The request object containing the message to add.
      id - The ID of the chat group to which the message will be added.
      Returns:
      A ChatGroupResponse object representing the updated chat group.
